code: import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const IssueChecklist=()=>{const issues=['Barandas rotas','Pisos oxidados','Presencia de basura','Grafitis ofensivos','Se침alizaci칩n desgastada','Grietas o filtraciones'];const[selectedIssues,setSelectedIssues]=useState([]);const toggleIssue=issue=>{setSelectedIssues(prev=>prev.includes(issue)?prev.filter(i=>i!==issue):[...prev,issue]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-6 rounded-xl shadow-md mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-4 text-gray-800",children:"Problemas detectados"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-3",children:issues.map(issue=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"flex items-center space-x-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:selectedIssues.includes(issue),onChange:()=>toggleIssue(issue),className:"h-5 w-5 text-blue-600 rounded focus:ring-blue-500"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-700",children:issue})]},issue))})]});};export default IssueChecklist;// DONE
